3: A horde of Corrupted has gathered in this area, but there aren't that many virtual projections appearing.
Do we not have enough data?
It's time-consuming to extract data from active Corrupted, not to mention the sheer number of them.
Then we'll just have to clear out a portion of them.
Lucia points to a group of rampant Corrupted in front of her.
These Corrupted are blocking the street. Looks like we have no choice but to fight if we want to keep going.
Lucia grabs her weapon and takes a step forward, but Liv looks nervously toward the northeastern side of Old Street.
After we pass through Old Street... Are we going to the Business District?
I just detected a high concentration of the Punishing Virus there, but now it's gone...
Is it moving? Or is something concealing their signal?
While everyone deliberates over the issue, you receive a message from Bridget.
Hey, we just got attacked by Corrupted. They destroyed a security terminal here. Are you all okay?
Suddenly, the virtual spacial data in your line of sight begins to fluctuate violently before disappearing.
Looks like our nearest security terminal was also attacked!
You take the cube out of your backpack and hand it to Lee, who begins setting it up hastily.
We've been spotted by the patrolling Corrupted, Commandant!
